from partner_station_rel
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
select a.name as userName,a.flower_name as flowerName,c.name as stationName,a.taobao_user_id as taobaoUserId from partner a,partner_station_rel b,station c
,cuntao_org d
where a.is_deleted='n' and b.is_deleted='n' and c.is_deleted='n'
and d.is_deleted='n'
and a.id=b.partner_id and b.station_id=c.id
and c.apply_org=d.id
and b.is_current='y' and b.type='TP' and b.state in('DECORATING','SERVICING','CLOSING')
and d.id=#{orgId}
and (a.name=#{name} or a.flower_name=#{name})
